data.title: Preity Zinta married: 6 men who weren’t ‘GOOD ENOUGH’ for the Dimple Queen of Bollywood
data.meta_description: Unlike her career in Bollywood, Pretty Preity had a controversial love life. She had dated quite a few men before she decided to tie a knot with Gene Goodenough.  - Preity Zinta married: 6 men who weren't 'GOOD ENOUGH' for the Dimple Queen of Bollywood
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
Unlike her career in Bollywood, Pretty Preity had a controversial love life. She had dated quite a few men before she decided to tie a knot with Gene Goodenough.

Preity Zinta married her boyfriend Gene Goodenough in Los Angeles on 29 February. The dimpled babe tied a knot finally and the nuptial ceremony was attended by close friends and family. There were rumours of the actress planning to get hitched in the last few weeks. But the actress denied the reports and also asked the gossipmongers to stay out of her personal life. However, the actress is no more single and we hear that the she will donate all the proceeds from her wedding to the charity. (ALSO READ: Preity Zinta marries boyfriend Gene Goodenough in Los Angeles)

Unlike her career in Bollywood, Pretty Preity had a controversial love life. She had dated quite a few men before she decided to tie a knot with Gene Goodenough. So lets have a look at these men who ruled Preity’s heart, though for a short span of time.

1. Ness Wadia:

Preity dated Ness Wadia for nearly four years and were often spotted together at various events. Their relationship was frequently under the media scanner and rumours of their engagement were rife until the couple parted ways. (ALSO READ: Preity Zinta married! Twitter trolls The Dimple Girl of Bollywood and her marriage with Gene Goodenough)

2. Yuvraj Singh:

Preity Zinta was spotted cozing up with Yuvraj Singh, the captain of her IPL team Punjab Kings XI after her relation with the Bombay Dyeing heir had hit the rocks. The two were seen sharing intimate moments publicly making it evident for the media to make some noise. However, soon after all the buzz died down.

3. Vikram Chatwal:

As differences started to venture between Preity and Ness’s relationship, rumours of the actress getting close to someone started spark. A leading daily had reported that the bollywood actress has started dating hotelier Vikram Chatwal back in 2009 following her split with Ness.

4. Marc Robinson:

Preity was reportedly dating model Marc Robinson during the early days of her career. News has it that they shared an intimate bond and were also living-in together. However, their hectic lifestyles affected their relationship and they called it a quits.

5. Shekhar Kapur:

Rumours were rife that filmmaker Shekhar Kapur’s ex-wife Suchitra Krishnamoorthy left him because he was quite close to the Veer Zara actor. However, Preity denied all the reports calling Suchitra unstable and wishing her speedy recovery. “It is unfortunate that I am bearing the brunt of someone else’s paranoia. She’s clearly unstable and I wish her a speedy recovery,” quoted the Bollywood star. ALSO READ: Preity Zinta to donate proceeds from wedding pictures to charity!

6. Lars Kjeldsen:

News of Preity Zinta having found love across the border started making buzz, after pictures of the actress with Lars Kjeldsen cropped up. It is believed that Preity was dating the white man and had been on a vacation to Hawai with him.
